website_summaries.verdict: Professionals and trendy travelers alike appreciate this stylish insulated lunch bag.
pros: Clever purse design offers large-capacity lunch box with stylish look
Built-in side pocket for utensils and napkins
Available in different sizes and colors

customer_reviews.title: The handle came off
customer_reviews.text: The handle for this bag came completely off after lightly using it for a month. There is no reason for it to already be falling apart. I had my last lunch bag for over three years and the only reason I replaced it was because I wanted a more visually appealing bag. I am extremely disappointed because I was looking forward to having a cute lunch bag, now I will have to find a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Lining is not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Cute and stylish looking lunch bag but it’s not waterproof as described. I didn’t want any surprises so first thing I did when it came was open it up and pour 1/4 cup of water in it and watched water start pooling out from the seams😕 bummer! Back it goes!
customer_reviews.author: SpeakGreen

customer_reviews.title: Very fashionable
customer_reviews.text: I like that the bag is super fashionable and can fit quite a few stuff. I specifically chose this bag because I wanted my meal prep containers to fit. It does fit but it can be a little tight. But it works perfectly well with other regular containers. There’s a front pouch where I normally just throw my keys or phone in when I have full hands.
customer_reviews.author: Shwe

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke after using for 2 weeks - poorly made product
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using this lunch bag for about 2 weeks and the handle already broke. The handle is not sturdy or it was poorly made. Either way, I am disattisfied with this purchase. See photo.
customer_reviews.author: AAguilar

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this bag 👍
customer_reviews.text: This bag is excellent! It has enough room to fit a ton of stuff as my photo shows . It’s sturdy, stylish and just the right size. So many people at work have complimented me on it!
customer_reviews.author: Mayemay

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I needed a bigger lunchbox for work so I wouldn’t have to eat out or eat a bunch of junk. It’s the perfect size to fit my lunch, a drink, and a few snacks along with a small ice pack. I work 10 hour days and so far everything has stayed cold the entire day and the ice pack has still been partially frozen. It seems well made and I have high hopes that it will hold together for years to come. I will warn you that this lunchbox is about the size of a small/medium purse so it may not be for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase this item
customer_reviews.text: This product deserves a “no star” rating. I purchased this as a Christmas present for my executive daughter. It is seriously a pick of junk and i have seen higher quality items at the dollar store.
customer_reviews.author: Regina K. Creitz

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: Got this bag today and it is super flimsy and crinkly. Nothing like described. Much smaller. And if you don’t have the arms of a kindergartner don’t even bother. (And I’m only 100 pounds) What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cutest Little Lunchbag
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this lunch bag! It was bigger than I expected and can comfortably hold everything i want to pack, but still small enough to fit on the second shelf of my work fridge and leaves plenty of room for my coworkers bags. It’s very cute, and I’ve recevied many compliments! It’s good material and quality with a sturdy zipper and handle. I’ve carried it every day for a month and have had no issues like some of the other reviews have mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Just received yesterday and today it's already something damage. I'm going to send this back.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Poole

customer_reviews.title: Cheap materials
customer_reviews.text: This product is very cheaply made. The zipper broke before I ever had a chance to even use it.
customer_reviews.author: Hardeetime

customer_reviews.title: 99% what I need for someone works long hours
customer_reviews.text: As someone working long hours a day, I need a lunch box presentable to work and able to contain two meals and snacks. Just got this bag for few days, used trice so far. Everyday I pack one cup of yogurt, one bottle of tea, a lunch box(glass) and a small pack a fruit. Works for me so far. Haven’t washed it yet so not sure about that part, handles are still there. The compartment outside I use if for my gloves, it’d Great if there is some design inside for small things like chargers or head phone(that missing 1%). However, it’s a lunch box after all. Works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a great bag
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a great bag! Very attractive and spacious, nice inside too. Mine arrived with some slight damage to one handle, just a bit of the fabric pulled out. I will fix it myself and it won't be an issue, but definitely be aware that this product may have some cosmetic difficulties in the handle department! I read a lot about the handles coming apart quickly, so I will see if I have that in the future.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Great for carrying my lunches to work!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size lunch box for carrying my food to work! Fits a standard size tupperwear with extra room! I always put my tupperware in there and my coffee mug on the end. The coffee mug is a tall skinny hydroflask so it kinda sticks out the top but I still zip it most of the way. I also love the front pocket. Has come in really handy for carrying extra documents, mail, fitness journal, ect. Not very insulated though. I always stick a back of ice in there if it will be a few hours before I get my stuff to a fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Krysti Weller

customer_reviews.title: Cute lunch bag
customer_reviews.text: I really like this lunch bag, but the shape can be a little awkward for some Tupperware (though I like to buy meal prep containers so they are longer than most containers.) I haven’t tested the insulation, so I can’t comment on that, but when I’ve had to share with my Elementary school daughter (since she “misplaced” hers), she didn’t mention her stuff being warm at lunch, and she didn’t complain about it being an “embarrassing” lunch box (she’s 10!- so that says something). If you’re in the market, this is a good lunch bag or weekend snack bag.
customer_reviews.author: Hank Wakefield

customer_reviews.title: Great bag and so cute!
customer_reviews.text: This lunch bag is so perfect! I actually receive tons of compliments on my “purse” when I take it places. It keeps good cool, is very very roomy, the pocket on the outside is great for silverware/napkins, and the handle shows no sign of wear. I use mind just about everyday mom-fri and it still looks brand new. Put a 33.8oz smart water bottle and a thermoflask for size reference.
customer_reviews.author: Elicia Cano

customer_reviews.title: Not even the right product.
customer_reviews.text: This is MUCH smaller than advertised. I bought the upgraded version and its way too small. Very disappointed. Doesn't even look like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Moore

customer_reviews.title: A tote... NOT for your lunch though!
customer_reviews.text: I totally regret making this purchase. The insulation is terrible. It’s definitely JUST a tote bag, NOT a lunch tote. Packing my meal preps in here is a thorn in my side. I would’ve been satisfied for space to at least fit 2 meals and 2 drinks without the zipper about to break. I literally take this to work to hold my supplies (markers, pens and gloves) and my books. I made a spill from my smoothie and I don’t think I’ll ever get the green from the seams on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Alex SS

customer_reviews.title: Good enough, the KIA of lunch boxes
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate this lunchbox for its size and simple, modern design, as well as easily foldable after you’re done for the day if empty. No insulation whatsoever which I can live with and was aware of before I bought, as I have ice packs, but don’t expect things to stay cold longer than the length of time it takes you to pack your lunch and eat it at a reasonable time.
customer_reviews.author: Helen LL

customer_reviews.title: Best bag I ever bought
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing negative to say about this lunchbox it is so cute and stylish! I actually bought one for my sister I ended up liking it so much I bought myself the same one! The amount of stuff the bag can hold us truly mind blowing compared to the way it looks. Attached is a photo of a container I can’t believe it fit into the bag. To give it a reference point the length of the bag is about the size of a Lysol can. I truly can’t get over how much it holds for the way it looks
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Wollweber- Maley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this lunch bag. It is a great size and when i got in the mail it was bigger than I thought it would be, but not too big for a lunch bag. It is very spacious in the inside and can fit a lot of food in it. There is even a front pocket that can fit utensils in there. I usually put my chopsticks in the front pocket. They fit perfectly. The inside is insulated and really helps keep my food cool. Plus it is really cute and have gotten compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: tia

customer_reviews.title: NOT Leakproof!!!
customer_reviews.text: One of my ice packs started to melt inside and the bag leaked all over the car and on my legs, it is now stained, and I will try to clean it.... but it is NOT leakproof. I am very dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: GypsyGirl83

customer_reviews.title: Great lunch bag!
customer_reviews.text: I debated which lunch bag to get since I take a good bit of food in a variety of different containers. Ultimately I got this one and the 14x6x10 inches, which worked for me considering the great prices! This one will definitely hold some of my rectangular containers better while the other one is better for jars and taller items. Very happy with the quality of both and they're both very attractive (I got the dark grey color in both).
customer_reviews.author: Lauren & Dan Green

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Lunch Bag for the office
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this bag for about a week - carrying large salads or big bowl of soup for my lunch. The handle fits nicely in your hand for carrying. I typically put an ice pack in the bottom and place items on top. The insulation and ice pack keeps the food well without requiring additional refrigeration.
customer_reviews.author: Fyredown

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I had a lunchbox but an unfortunate event led me to throw it out. I wanted a new one that was plain because my backpack is decorative. This works great. I can't fit as much as I would like, as I need a lot of food when commuting to class for the whole day, but it keeps my food cold and that all I really care about.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Hornbacher

customer_reviews.title: Great lunchbox!
customer_reviews.text: This lunchbox holds so much food, yet doesn't take up much space in the refrigerator. I'm out of the house for over 12hrs a day, so I pack a lot of food. Today it holds a glass tupperware with oatmeal, a tupperware with a baked potato and broccoli, a tupperware with veggies, a tupperware with fruit, 3 condiment tupperware containers, a banana, a cheese stick, and silverware with room to spare. It is lined so the food stays cold in the fridge. It has a side pocket, the stitching is solid, and the zipper is a good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Liza

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Great Size
customer_reviews.text: Nice and big. I was a bit hesitant because of the reviews but I got it today and was pleasantly surprised. It's roomy and cute. I can't wait to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Rosario De la torre

customer_reviews.title: Strand broke in 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I only had this bad for 2 months and the strap unraveled and broke. It’s a nice bag and I didn’t carry anything heavy on it. And it’s broke already.
customer_reviews.author: paris bailey

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bag to take my lunch in and this looked great. The size is a little bigger and it looked cute in the pic. Unfortunately the materials feel just ok and the brown color is absolutely awful. It looks and feels like a cheap lunch bag.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for the past month at work and it's perfect! It is a little big, but looking at the other lunch pails in the fridge at work it's comparable in size and holds everything I need it to hold. The inside is insulated and easy to clean, and I get lots of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Lstope426

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Confession: I only use this bag to put carrots in to take to the barn. Somehow we ended up with picky horses that love cold carrots and not ones that have been sitting out and are warm.... *Face-Palm* Thankfully, this little bag does the trick and the carrots stay nice and cold in here!! The best part about this bag is that I have been able to get any dirt off super easily inside or on the outside!!! The side pocket is perfect to store extra stuff in!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Stockdale

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag just came in the mail today and it is super cute! I ordered the denim pattern. It seems to be a very durable bag and for such a cheap price. The reason I am giving it only 4 stars is that I have yet to use the bag so I want to see how durable it actually is. I'm planning on just using it as an everyday lunch bag for school but I am very pleased with the quality for the price I paid!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds much more than you would think!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about 5 months and it shows no sign of wear. It provides some insulation, plenty for a daily lunch box. It looks small and cute and professional, but holds a serious amount of food! I love this lunchbox and would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: corbey

customer_reviews.title: Roomy, meal prep ready, easy to clean, non-bulky lunchbox for grownups.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean, fits twi full sized meal prep plates and 6 snack/side dish containers plus two shaker cups, utensils and a pill container. Very roomy. The color is bright I chose the navy and white flowers since it matches my scrub color. Good product foe the price. I thought I was not going to like the handles or they might be flimsy - but they are not.
customer_reviews.author: Ileana Torres

customer_reviews.title: Stores a day's worth of food, affordable, & cute!!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this lunch bag for a couple of weeks but for the price and amount of food it holds, you really can't go wrong. I work two jobs and very often go directly from one to another so I need a full days worth of food and this fits everything I need and is also very cute, aaaaand doesn't cost a fortune. What more could you want? No regrets with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MaKiera Broen

customer_reviews.title: Love my bag
customer_reviews.text: I got this bag and only had it maybe three weeks I totally live this bag it’s so cute and not only did I think if I buy it will I look like a kid with it but no it just looks like it’s for adults so pretty spacious comfortable. It fits a lot of stuff in it.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I really needed an all purpose bag that appeared to be a lunch bag to keep my supervisors away (I work in a jail). This bag is it! I can literally store my small desk heater, 2 small food containers with my breakfast, a bottle of water and lotion, pens, sanitizer and whatever little junk I may or may not need. Considering the amount of stuff I put into this bag it is holding up wonderfully so far after a month. Would def recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nyla

customer_reviews.title: It's cute!
customer_reviews.text: This lunch box is super cute and big enough to carry all my lunch, however, it is SO stiff. It is lined with a foil-like material for insulation. Frustrates me every time I struggle to stuff my lunch containers in it. I feel like I need to heat it up with a blow dryer or something to get it to relax. But, it is cute!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Lewandowsky

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: After 3 weeks, I've stuffed it to the gills on numerous occasions, even carrying my iPad, water bottle, lunch in it and it's held up well.
customer_reviews.author: J. King

customer_reviews.title: Really good lunch bag!
customer_reviews.text: Really pleasantly surprised by how well made this lunch bag is! It’s really nice to look at, the inside insulation is secured down & not all loose. Ample space for your needs, stores nicely! I am very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Girl

customer_reviews.title: Lightning Deal
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this lunch box. I have been waiting for it to go down in price, and then I saw it was a lightning deal. It's cute, roomy, easy to clean and carry. I really enjoy it. It's my good insulated well. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tha Book Slayer

customer_reviews.title: Overall good purchase, roomy, holds large containers
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily for lunch that I carry to work. It's very roomy and is good for holding large salad containers plus snacks, dressing, etc. It's better to pack with an ice packs because of the size, it doesn't fit easily into a fridge. Overall, I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A Hisey

customer_reviews.title: Stylish lunch bag
customer_reviews.text: The bag is def true to color and the handles are brown fyi. The inside is easy to clean but the outside fabric not so much. The bag is also more on the smaller side. You maybe able to pack one meal in there; or two meal prep containers and then it gets tight.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Poorly insulated
customer_reviews.text: This will not hold ice packs for more than 3 to 4 hours. It's nice in other aspects but in the most important one it doesn't measure up. Wish I hadn't waited to give it a second try because it's too late to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag use for make up & sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! Bought 3 for Christmas and ended up keeping one for myself! They are very roomy! I use mine as a make up/ sunscreen bag and no melting or getting runny when I leave it in the car! I live in the south and it gets hot & humid!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke
customer_reviews.text: Zipper broke after 3rd use, which is unfortunate because I really liked this lunch box. Very stylish but just didn’t last long at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lunch Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice lunch bag, I was just hoping it would be a little bigger. It doesn't have much give, so its kind of hard to stuff it with more than one big container. I really like the look of it & it does the job, I just wish it held more.
customer_reviews.author: Tsparks31

customer_reviews.title: Works really well, large and roomy.
customer_reviews.text: I do love my new lunchbox. Works really well, very roomy. So far it has held up very well.. I do wish it had a shoulder handle for easier carrying. The side pocket is handy.
customer_reviews.author: Joy h

customer_reviews.title: Really cute bag - Good size
customer_reviews.text: Vute bag. I got the solid gray and it's a good size for microwave meals to lay flat. The design doesn't look obvious that it's an isolated lunch bag. I like that. Good purchase
customer_reviews.author: shopalot

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Stylish and seems easy to clean, but will likely be returning. I don't like how the sides lay flat and are not sturdy, unless it is packed full. Not like the pictures show.
customer_reviews.author: M Silver

customer_reviews.title: Nice and neutral
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day to bring my lunch to work. It's a good size (big enough but not too big--tall enough that a canned drink can sit straight up (probably could fit 5 or so if you tried). It's insulated but you'll need an ice pack or two for things to really stay cold during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren H.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and super big!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a lunch bag that holds at least two, if not three meals. This bag delivers. I can put two meal prep containers and a small bag for snacks and breakfast, or I can put in my shaker bottle instead of snacks. It's solid in feel, and looks way more stylish than any lunch bag I've used. I put my napkin in the front pouch and clip my reusable lunch utensils to the outside. It stays cold and I would totally buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product. Perfect for 2 - 4 lunches.
customer_reviews.text: Spacious, well constructed product. Solves the problem of the little, leaky soft cooler bags. When you need a little extra space but not enough to justify a hard shell cooler, this is it! Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Chelle Austen

customer_reviews.title: Great lunchbag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is wonderful. It stores several of my plastic Rubbermaid Tupperware perfectly. Great storage capacity & it's easy to clean. I get several compliments on it at work & a few of my co-workers have bought the same one.
customer_reviews.author: Shanster84

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Was actually surprised at the amount of space this lunch bag has. I could carry 2 meals in here if I wanted. Really easy to clean. I don't know how well the insulation actually works - I stick the whole bag in the refrigerator at work & prepare my lunches the night prior. It has strong, thick handles.
customer_reviews.author: Brie

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: I love this lunch bag! I get compliments every time I bring it to the office or elsewhere. It can fit so much food inside, as well as pretty large tupperware containers. It's also pretty easy to clean on the inside. The only thing I wish it offered was better insulation for keeping things cold, but it achieves the purpose of carrying lunch every day.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Burgin

customer_reviews.title: compliments!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lunch case! It keeps my food super cold and all of my odd shaped food containers fit perfectly inside. I love the front pocket because I can take other items with me to lunch without needing two different bags. And I have gotten so many compliments on my "new purse", I love seeing people's expressions when they find out its a lunch bag!
customer_reviews.author: ziska

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This product is very well made. I love that its insulated and the handles are thick for comfort. My favorite new lunch box. And it fits alot in it. I put a cereal container, lunch container, two drinks and snacks zip it up and ready to go. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this lunchbox. Everyone at work always thinks it’s my purse because it looks much nicer than a normal lunchbox! It serves its purpose well, couldn’t ask for more. No rips/tears and I’ve been using it for well over 5 months...
customer_reviews.author: Paige Mosier

customer_reviews.title: Complete meal experience
customer_reviews.text: Liked the product. The insulation inside the bag very impressive. Space wise able to accumulate 3 boxes and one 500ml water bottle. Product finishing was satisfactory. Great option of color Selections. I have been using this from more than a month now. No complaints so far.
customer_reviews.author: HarshaV

customer_reviews.title: Jaws!
customer_reviews.text: Love me some sharks! Food stays cold but I would say not the easiest to clean on outside. Used scrubby sponge but didn’t get all foid that had dried on outside.
customer_reviews.author: sharkgrl9

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for me!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lunch box! It a great size to bring food for multiple days. I like to bring fresh ingredients and build my lunches each day and this is great! It’s on the bigger size but not outrageous or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Thiessen

customer_reviews.title: So Cute and Functional
customer_reviews.text: For an avid meal prepper, this lunchbox is a must! It holds a lot and it's super cute to carry. No issues with cleaning and easily fits in the work fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A

customer_reviews.title: Spacious
customer_reviews.text: There is so much room in this bag, I was very presently surprised. I really only use this bag to carry my snacks back and forth to work, but I think it would do fine if it was used to keep food or beverages cold for a while. The color is also fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: Marla

customer_reviews.title: An upgrade for sure!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to upgrade the look of my work snack/lunch bag. This didn’t disappoint! Roomy enough for a few glassware containers, yogurt, and snack baggies. Glad to have purchased this one.
customer_reviews.author: missmc2

customer_reviews.title: Cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Item just arrived and seams are already coming apart. Foil is very loud and crinkly. Made with very thin flimsy material. The brown handles don’t look good on the colored bag I got.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisAnn

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lunch bag, very trendy and discreet. I’ve gotten a lot of compliments about it, people tell me it looks more like a purse than a regular lunch bag. So far it works well, still as good as new, it’s easy to clean and has enough space so that I can put breakfast, lunch and 2-3 snacks. Can’t put my water bottle though but it’s big (32 oz hydroflask). Works well for me and I’ve recommended it to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchae
customer_reviews.text: I had been searching for an easy to carry lunch bag that would take my ziplock reusable containers (square shaped), plus a yogurt and a couple of snacks or apple. This bag has been the perfect solution - just the right size and dimensions. The construction looks good and sturdy. I like the handles which are easy to grab and the pocket is great to stash keys and my phone. It is also very attractive and does not look cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Vince S.

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute and Durable
customer_reviews.text: This bag is super cute! It can fit quite a bit more than I thought. I love home I can flatten it completely to fit it anywhere. This lunch bag feels really durable and I am planning on buying some as Christmas presents to a few women and teens.
customer_reviews.author: ZekieMayaMama2

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BAG!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag so much. I am using to bring lunch and purse items! One and done! It looks really sharp and is well made. In fact, I bought a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Handbag looking lunch bag
customer_reviews.text: This lunch bag is so good looking that people consider it hand bag most of the times. Nobody would know you are carrying your food, it will give you a decent look. It is very spacious, you can even fit your water bottle along with your lunch. It’s worth.
customer_reviews.author: Pratik satrawala

customer_reviews.title: I love this lunch box!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s super cute! I wish I could fit a little more in it but either way, I love this lunch box. I stick an ice pack in there and my food stays cool all day long. And it has a little front pocket where I stick some cloth napkins. So cute.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: This product is as described; the only thing is if you use those freezer packs for travel it does make the bottom material sweat but it is minimal
customer_reviews.author: DeCarla Ables

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on sale and love it. Very cute blue and yellow floral design. My daughter likes mine so much that I had to order her one in a different design.
customer_reviews.author: B. Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to carry lunch - two tiffin toxes, one small water bottle and one packet for for fruits. It does not stay warm. The material is good and has not shown signs of wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: riddhi ajmera

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Teacher Gift Idea
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, well made. We brought this as a gift bag for 1st grader's teacher and filled it with a Christmas reusable cup/straw and snacks, attached a hanging hand sanitizer to the handle. She loved it. I looks like a cute purse and there were several to choose from. We went with the school's color, dark blue. It's a deep blue but could not be mistaken for black.
customer_reviews.author: Dgn

customer_reviews.title: No as big as I thought and the zipper was ...
customer_reviews.text: No as big as I thought and the zipper was made with cheap materials, afriad it may break any seconds, overall the bag is decent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Given as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a Christmas gift. She loved it. Very roomy and seems to be durable. I know several others who have the same bag and they really like them. I purchased this bag on their recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: MommaT622

customer_reviews.title: Great space...
customer_reviews.text: So far it has been great for my daughter to bring her lunch to school in each day. Used for about s month. Lots of space. Keeps food cold with ice pack. Very satisfied. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Kanuch

customer_reviews.title: Great lunch bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag because the one I had wasn't big enough to take leftover containers in. This one is great, I can fit a cold pack, two water bottles and left over containers in it. Great bag!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle and Don

customer_reviews.title: It's really cute and works very well
customer_reviews.text: Kept food cold for a long time, it also looks really cute. 10/10 would do again. Only concern is that the handles seem a bit filmsy... but we'll find out in awhile if it's durable. Everything else is great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Lana0021

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Functional
customer_reviews.text: I love this lunch box and so does everyone else. Its very cute. It does a great job with keeping my food hot and it's very big. I am able to fit a 44 oz water bottle inside as well as multiple food containers and snacks. I would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Everything fits
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This is my favorite lunch bag. Everything fits. Purchased the small simply modern summit bottle and it fits perfectly in this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Lunch Bag Yet!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag to use for my lunch. It holds its shape really well and I can fit a lot into it. I struggle with having multiple items in my hand when walking into the office. This bag allows me to pack my lunch and my to go coffee mug all in one place! I have also received NUMEROUS compliments on the design. Very pleased with this order.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe Brie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a birthday gift, and monogrammed it. She loved it, and loved the size. Very spacious to pack a lunch plus snacks.
customer_reviews.author: Michele York

customer_reviews.title: Seems Well Made
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Looks nice. The stitching is well done. Not too big yet, it can hold two lunches. It appears to be a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DWILLIS

customer_reviews.title: Enormous
customer_reviews.text: I looked closely at the photos and size specs, and this was still way larger than I anticipated. No way it will fit in my backpack to work. It is really nice, though. Would be great if I was willing to carry it separately.
customer_reviews.author: KTN

customer_reviews.title: Cute but bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than I expected (like a second purse). I wish it had pockets on the inside. It has a insulated-type inside. Love the design, though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute bag but not leakproof
customer_reviews.text: Cute lunch box! People ask me if it’s a purse. Keeps my lunch cold with a cold pack. It is easy to clean; however, I had something spill inside it and it leaked through to the outside and the bag has stained.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: It is smaller than what is seen in the pictures. The handles do not look sturdy either. It's almost like a children's bag.
customer_reviews.author: shweta shahi

customer_reviews.title: Great Lunch Bag for College!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag so far. I got it for college because I am a commuter so I wanted to pack my lunches. This bag is going to be great for the semester. It is not big but not small either. Enough for about two meals worth. I can put my drinks, containers, and snacks in it. And its insulated and easy to clean. Super professional looking and feels durable. Love this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and roomy
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful lunch bag. My daughter loves it! Holds lots of lunch. Ice pack, thermos, water bottle, a lunchable, and still has room for more!
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Cute and roomy!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is surprisingly roomy. I can fit a full liter of seltzer with room for my lunch as well. It's cute, kind of like a doctor's bag shape, and I've gotten a lot of compliments on it. There's no shoulder strap which I'm now realizing would have been handy as I juggle purse, keys, shoes, books, etc. into work in the morning, but I'm still happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and durable!
customer_reviews.text: It's a really great and stylish bag. I get lots of compliments on it. Some people even think it's a purse! I love it. It didn't leak when I had a can explode in my bag but it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable lunch tote!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lunch tote to include in a raffle gift basket for a women's seminar. It's great! It can easily pass for a purse! It's light, fashionable & insulated for food items. The front pocket can fit a cell phone. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Huge lunch tote
customer_reviews.text: I like this bag so far. Its been 2 weeks since I started using it. I have washed it in the washer too and nothing happened. It can hold a lot! May be your breakfast, lunch and 2 snack boxes. I would have liked a slightly smaller bag for a daily lunch tote. The manufacturer also has a smaller bag. My mistake. I should have picked that one.
customer_reviews.author: v++

customer_reviews.title: Love this Bag !!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Lunch bag I get compliments all the time ... I am a very busy person and with this bag it is the perfect size for a girl on the go ... I feel I am eating better and taking better car of myself now with my bag and it is cool inside and out ... Thankyou ! Virginia Beach
customer_reviews.author: Ginny Beach

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: This lunch box is very cute! The only thing I don't love about it is the fabric brown handle. I think a leather/vinyl handle would have looked better. The bag looks nice, but the handle looks cheap. Otherwise, it is great and holds quite a bit! It was a great price as well!
customer_reviews.author: klbankert

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I needed a lunch box for work that would hold my lunch, snacks, and water bottle. This lunch box holds literally EVERYTHING. I love how the bottom is flat so my containers can lay at the bottom and my water bottle fits perfectly next to it. Keeps everything cool and is super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: It’s a cute lunch bag with plenty of space for a single meal prep. It travels well and has double zippers which is very helpful. I tend to be less rough with items so it has lasted me.
customer_reviews.author: H. Bender

♥Sturdy Grab Soft Handles---2020 Upgraded handle strong linen handles and durable 600D oxford material connect by double dense curve stitching makes the handles are extremely durable. We have put 11kg items into this lunch bag, and hang it horizontally suspension for 3 days,the handle part is still works well!

♥Keep Your Food Fresh&Warm---BALORAY reusable Lunch Bag is made of the highly 600D Polyester, food safe lining and sturdy zippers. Premium fabric makes this lunch box durable, sturdy and easy to clean. Insulation helps retain hot and cold temperatures throughout the day to improve food quality, freshness and taste.

♥Lightweight &Portable---A large front pocket, you can put phone, wallet, keys, cards, charger, small change napkins, and any other small stuff in this 10.5x5 inches side pocket.It’s convenient to be used as your lunch bag, picnic bag, sundry bag or shopping bag.
